item.title: File Transfer - Cheat Sheet
item.description: Welcome to this cheat sheet on the different methods of file transfer between an “attacker” machine and a “victim” machine! When accessing a machine remotely, the ability to transfer files effectively is essential. This guide provides an overview of the various methods used. Linux HTTP Server # Sender python -m SimpleHTTPServer 80 # Recipient wget http://192.168.1.1/File2Transfer o curl -o File2Transfer http://192.168.1.130/File2Transfer SCP (SSH utility) Upload file: scp File2Transfer user@192.168.1.1:/home/user/ Download file:
